page.title: 08RESIDENTS-PLACE OF WORK
page.content: We were interested in finding out whether or not Harrold was a "dormitory village". We thought that,perhaps,most residents would work in London or possibly in Milton Keynes. However the results of our survey of lOO people showed that 22% of our sample worked in Bedford and over 6O% worked either in Harrold itself or very locally in neighbouring villages. Only about 5% worked in London with a similar number working in Milton Keynes, whilst the remaining l3% described themselves as 'mobile', working throughout the south east of the country.
